FAT functions.


Functions

char * NE_FATLoadData (char *filename)
 Load a file to RAM. Returns a pointer to the location of the file that will have to be freed with free().
u32 NE_FATFileSize (char *filename)
 Returns size of a file. -1 if error.
int NE_ScreenshotBMP (char *filename)
 Takes a screenshot of main screen (or both screens in dual 3D mode) and saves it as BMP. Returns 1 if OK, 0 if error.

Detailed Description

Functions to load data from FAT, and to take screenshots.

Function Documentation

u32 NE_FATFileSize ( char *  filename  ) 

Returns size of a file. -1 if error.

Parameters:
filename File to check.

char* NE_FATLoadData ( char *  filename  ) 

Load a file to RAM. Returns a pointer to the location of the file that will have to be freed with free().

Parameters:
filename Path to the file.

int NE_ScreenshotBMP ( char *  filename  ) 

Takes a screenshot of main screen (or both screens in dual 3D mode) and saves it as BMP. Returns 1 if OK, 0 if error.

Parameters:
filename File to save the screenshot.
